segments.text: Did you say you saw lily alone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where did you say she was ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must say I think that is very odd . Are you absolutely certain it was her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I don't want any , er , do you understand ? But you are quite sure , are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite sure . I mean that hair of hers and the voice of hers .
segments.speaker: S2
